${ModID}:Aqueducts.NAME: Aqueducts
${ModID}:Aqueducts.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw an extra card, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Cascade.NAME: Cascade
${ModID}:Cascade.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Flow. Gain !B! Block for each card discarded this way.

${ModID}:Hail.NAME: Hail
${ModID}:Hail.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Hits an additional time for each time this was discarded this combat.

${ModID}:HighTide.NAME: High Tide
${ModID}:HighTide.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you ${ModID}:Flow, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

${ModID}:Pneumatics.NAME: Pneumatics
${ModID}:Pneumatics.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Flow. NL At the start of your next turn, ${ModID}:Flow. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Pneumatics.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Flow. NL At the start of your next turn, ${ModID}:Flow.

${ModID}:ReleaseValve.NAME: Release Valve
${ModID}:ReleaseValve.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you ${ModID}:Flow, enemy takes !M! damage for each card discarded. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Reservoir.NAME: Reservoir
${ModID}:Reservoir.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Flow. Draw cards equal to the number of cards discarded this way. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:StormFront.NAME: Storm Front
${ModID}:StormFront.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Deal !D! damage. NL When discarded, add this back to your hand with !M! more damage.
